text: NBA player Nick Young ( L ) and recording artist Iggy Azalea attend the 2015 Billboard Music Awards at MGM Grand Garden Arena on May 17, 2015 in Las Vegas, Nevada. Don't mess with Iggy Azalea. During Sunday's episode of ` ` Watch What Happens Live With Andy Cohen,'' the 27 - year - old rapper went into detail about how she burned the designer clothes of her ex fiance Nick Young. ` ` I burned it all, darling,'' she said. ` ` I burned a lot, and I threw stuff in the pool too. I started off with water and it seemed like that didn't work.'' When host Andy Cohen asked the ` ` Black Widow'' artist about the most expensive item she burned, she replied, ` `
